You would not recognize this game anymore. The reason being that, for ADCs to be out of meta, you'd need **major** changes to so many core systems.

The reason we have an ADC bot lane is not that they need the support and protection from another player. It is just that ranged auto-attack-based champions are the one class of champions that suffers the least from sharing XP, as melees want XP for the invaluable tank stats (base HP and Armor triple to quadruple between level 1 and 18) and ability focused champions want XP for the improvements on their abilities (higher base damages, lower cooldowns, increased utility...). On a ranged AD champion, both your level-dependant offensive stats barely double between level 1 and 18.

To the people complaining about drain tanking adcs: That isn't the root of the problem. Lifesteal should be the only defensive stat for adcs. Remember, lifesteal used to be MUCH higher (bloodthirster giving something like 100 AD and 25% lifesteal, not unique) and back then a lot of people didn't want it to be reduced so much, but it was because it was so easy to get to full health off a couple minions. The problem is it's becoming way too easy to make use of lifesteal; back then, adcs were deleted instantaneously no matter what if they didn't get peel, so lifesteal only worked in a clutch manner. Now they have defensive options and much more survivable early games, allowing them to make much more use of lifesteal even though it isn't as abundant as it was before. Hit those strengths first.
